meanings.sent1: His schnozzes made him easily recognizable in the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The clown had a red nose that was bigger than most schnozzes.
meanings.sent3: The schnozzes on the statue looked comically oversized.
meanings.sent4: Her schnozzes sniffed out trouble before anyone else could.
meanings.sent5: The schnozzes in the cartoon were drawn as exaggeratedly long and pointy.

meanings.sent1: The comedian's jokes always had the audience laughing schnozzes off.
meanings.sent2: She collected vintage schnozzes from different eras.
meanings.sent3: The box was filled with colorful schnozzes of all shapes and sizes.
meanings.sent4: The room echoed with the sound of schnozzes hitting the floor.
meanings.sent5: The market was bustling with vendors selling schnozzes of all kinds.
